title: I got a 75 kill game with katarina in a normal game?
body:
Is it supposed to like a new highest  kat kill with real people? I dont really know , the game took 44 minutes and i was 75 and 9 , I dont really know how i reached this point its just crazy. The game was in a draft pick and their rank i think it was like silver and high bronze , low rank , probably thats how i got that score , but its just really really dumb that I got this score , my highest one before this was 33 , now i got 75? wtf
Here is the link of the match : https://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/3163525110/2044151966092128?tab=overview

replies.body: {{item:3089}} {{item:3907}}  is better than {{item:3089}}{{item:3089}}
was trolling at that point i once bouhgt 5 rabadons just for meme

https://live.staticflickr.com/880/40664801055_7ab360c4f3_o.png[/img]

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
How could you not finish the game?

> [{quoted}](name=Yboat,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=PEE1ke0p,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-10-02T05:32:16.923+0000)
>
> How could you not finish the game?

Keeps the game going for this exact reason.
killfarming instead of ending. its always the same.  u often hear people say pls dont end shortly before the nexus/nexus towers are destroyed...
I fail to see how beating up on some one that can't fight back is fun.  It's being a bully.  Just end it and move on.
they do that probably to get more kills/assists and so it will be more likely to get a s-rank. i dont thinks its about having fun punching defenseless people.
It's a video game. Running over pedestrians in GTA is fun, why not this?

> [{quoted}](name=Kat XD,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=PEE1ke0p,comment-id=00000000000000000000,timestamp=2019-10-02T10:22:30.990+0000)
>
> It's a video game. Running over pedestrians in GTA is fun, why not this?

Because pedestrians in GTA are NPCs while the enemy players in this LoL match were real people.
lol
[It was 4v5.](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/PEE1ke0p-i-got-a-75-kill-game-with-katarina-in-a-normal-game?comment=0006)
It was a 4v5
Shit happens.
not ending the game and being a douche is unsportsmanlike.
It was 4v5. Despite being behind, having an extra man means the 5 man team had more pressure which makes it difficult for a 4 man team to end quickly.
now do it in a ranked game.
impossible highest i got is 35 , impossible
Ok.
r/humblebrag

That game was 4v5 which is why that happened. Being a man short means your team was significantly lacking in the ability to create pressure compared to the enemy team. So what happens in games where the 4 man team is ahead is that it gets extremely difficult to end the game. You basically end up killing them over and over again without being able to end off it. A sufficiently skilled team can end quickly while being a man short but those players were unranked and Bronze players. They would not know how to adjust their macro play to account for the significant lack of pressure.
My best was in aram with talon 3 pentas and around 40 some kills. Game didnt last long
